title: Faucet

description: Call a contract on a connected chain from ZetaChain

zrc20.summary: ZRC-20 token address to pay cross-chain fees

receiver.summary: Receiver contract address on the connected chain (non-hex strings will be encoded)

chainId.summary: Chain ID of the destination network

revertAddress.summary: Address to receive tokens if the transaction reverts

abortAddress.summary: Address to receive tokens if transaction is aborted

callOnRevert.summary: Call onRevert handler if the transaction fails

onRevertGasLimit.summary: Gas limit for the revert transaction

revertMessage.summary: Message to include in the revert call

callOptionsGasLimit.summary: Gas limit for the contract call on the connected chain

types.summary: List of parameter types (e.g. uint256 address) (variadic: pass as space-separated values, not JSON array)

values.summary: Parameter values for the function call (variadic: pass as space-separated values, not JSON array)

name: zetachain_call

receiver.summary: Receiver contract address on the connected chain (non-hex strings will be encoded)

chainId.summary: Chain ID of the destination network

revertAddress.summary: Address to receive tokens if the transaction reverts

abortAddress.summary: Address to receive tokens if transaction is aborted

callOnRevert.summary: Call onRevert handler if the transaction fails

onRevertGasLimit.summary: Gas limit for the revert transaction

revertMessage.summary: Message to include in the revert call

callOptionsGasLimit.summary: Gas limit for the contract call on the connected chain

amount.summary: The amount of tokens to withdraw
